评论详情: Loved this cute romper. Shorts were shorter than I would've liked but it worked well for our tropical hike!
Perfect romper for working out, a sporty outfit, comfortable and size worked great! Did I mention the material is soft and summer perfect!
I wanted to love this, I ended up returning though because it was not flattering and didn’t fit very well. Looked frumpy in some areas.
Love this! So cute and breathable for a golf tournament or work out. 5'1, 180lbs and I ordered a XL. Perfect for me!
I’m 5’7 and 125 lbs and this one just didn’t fit right because of my height. The color was beautiful though and the fabric felt great! It was one I wish I could have kept.

I loved this for so much I purchased it in pink and blue! This one has the build in bra with the padded inserts! The quality was great and the length was perfect for a mom or young girl! The material was a great quality not too thin or thick! This was quick to dry and breathable for a day in the park! The colors were vibrant and I had so many compliments!
Love this!

I got influenced on Instagram to buy this free people dupe and how happy am I that I did. It is a little short , but for the hot summer months , I don’t mind it if I’m doing something active be a use there are shorts that are tighter to not expose anything unwanted. I love that I don’t have to wear a bra with this either. 10/10
Got exactly what I paid for! Super comfortable, quality is very nice and it’s overall a very cute look!

My daughter bought this and has LOVED wearing it to theme parks and camp this summer. I feel like I’ve seen SO many people wearing this. It’s most popular in black, but I love the blue my daughter chose.
Looks great! I would definitely recommend.

评论概述: Easy to throw on and super cute

love the sporty look of this romper! great free people dupe, 10/10 recommend
Great outfit however wished it came with padding for the bra…could go without a bra except that it has no padding. Also rides up very short…which if I was younger may be ok!
So comfy and cute … fits to size I love it and want more colors

评论概述: I really wanted to love this

I have a small torso  so I don’t normally have this problem with rompers or anything. I wish I would have chosen the black or a darker color. I don’t think it would show as much. It’s just okay.
Easy, Fun casual outfit for summer. Wish I had every color! Love it!
Cute to throw on to run to the store or to lounge around.  Built in panties aren’t bad. Some people complained about them.

评论概述: Cute, but didn’t have removable cups.
评论详情: Love this!  It was so cute, but as a 40 year old mom, I need some removable cups!  This outfit does not have them.  The way the back straps criss crossed would make it tough to wear a bra…I was not about to wear a strapless bra so I returned it.
Lo mismo se puede usar para hacer ejercicio como para el diario. Cómodo y fresca y de buena calidad.

评论概述: FP dupe. Comfortable for everyday wear.
评论详情: Love love love this romper. I would order one in every color if I could. The quality is excellent and I get so many compliments wearing it. Fit is super comfortable and true to size mostly. I have one in black and one in the red as pictured above. Great quality. Red romper has a white lining inside where the black romper does not. Overall I am obsessed with both.
Very breathable material and comfortable

评论概述: Me gustó pero muy corto y abierto
评论详情: Está súper buen material, queda en el Teams lo correcto, pero el short es muy corto y tiene las aberturas a los lados muy grandes

I need all the colors! I’m 5’6”, my weight is 170 lbs, have a short torso, long legs, and 9 month pp. I usually order a large is most things but I saw the reviews recommend sizing down so I ordered a medium and it’s perfect! It’s nice and stretchy and gives a snatching effect around the waist. The black is a perfect neutral closer peice and will be a piece I reach for all the time. I did already wash it, and it washes just fine. I also ordered the sky color and it is a true sky/pastel blue color. In the ad I also thought it might be more of a periwinkle color but there is not purple tones in it. The sky romper does seem to be a little tighter fitting but the medium is still definitely the correct size for me. Neither the black or the sky are see through both seem nice quality. I will continue to update on other colors as I order them.
I really love this romper. It’s adorable and sporty. Well made.  Buttttttt, with most clothing like this now, there is typically padding included which this one DOES NOT have.
Great material but rompers are not my thing as my thighs say so!! Wish they were
This romper is a great fit, true to size. The material is soft and breathable, making it perfect for all-day wear.

So disappointed. I wanted to love this!! First off, I like the way the bodice fits - I don’t need a bra and is enough support to just run errands or lounge in (I would NOT workout in this). The back criss-cross is cute too.  The worst part for me is the waist band. I’m only 5’2 so I have a short torso. I wish it sat more around the natural waist, but instead sits lower at the top my hips. It’s not flattering. As others have said, it’s bunches/rides up too and the keyhole cutout kind of gets lost. I kept having to pull it down. The shorts are also too big/loose. It’s just a weird fit overall. I wish there was an XS option. For 40 bucks, this isn’t it.
The only thing I didn’t like about this was it had no padding in the bra area
My favorite romper! SO comfy!

Such good quality. Soft and very cute. I’m 180 lbs and wearing a Large

I would say this one is not tall girl approved. I struggle with migraines, and it pulled very tightly on my shoulders due to not being long enough. The top fit perfectly, and I think the sizing up would have made things too big it is very cute, but I think it is for short torso girls.

Perfect free people dupe! Only complaint is… the keyhole in the front kind of bunches up and you can’t really see you have that cut out piece. The shorts are a little larger around the thighs but it’s so comfy!!

评论概述: Weird lines on the front? But fine overall

评论概述: Material is much more comfortable and airy

Really wanted to love this but it didn’t fit in the right places. Got a medium which is my usual size.

True to size. Looks just like the photo as. Very comfortable. I went running in it and very minimal wedgies. I am a member of the itty bitty committee so I did not need to wear a bra with this it has lining inside, but no built-in bra Unfortunately, no pockets but everything else great. Good for running/walking, but cute enough to run errands in.
Compared to FP there are almost no differences! Good value for price
Definitely not a good dupe for the free people version. Not with keeping. Maybe just not for tall people.
This is super cute, but it did NOT come with shorts under. It’s like an underwear lining and you can see the side of your cheeks.

This has very little to no support up top and the line shows around the top after it is washed so it looks like it has white trim around the top.  If you want to wear it to work out and need support, you must wear an extra sports bra.  It is great just for running errands and that sort of thing.  The fit is true to size.  It is loose on the bottom which makes it super comfortable. I would give it a 5 if the lining were not showing or if it was the same color so you could not see it.
Super comfy. Perfect to fun errands.
It’s comfortable and fit true to size. I do wish that it had removable cups but otherwise it’s cute and fits good
I wanted to love this it’s cute but the side slits go up so high! I’m always making sure my cheeks are covered and I even sized up in hopes of avoiding this.

This is my new favorite fit - it’s snug like a hug, and it has a built in sports bra with removable pads (I left them in) that holds even my gigantic tiddies in place without another bra underneath. I can literally just put this on & go 👍
Not ideal for a long torso. But cute

Shorts underneath are the underwear style shorts, not biker shorts. Top at the front and back flip out so you can see tag and it’s folded in front. Very comfortable for running and cute, but also really short if you are comfortable but if you don’t like short shorts, it can feel revealing.
Very pretty on
This is going to work best for people who are 5’6 or shorter.
Love the fit and feel of the fabric!

评论概述: Ignore the bad reviews unless you have a long torso
评论详情: I was super worried after reading the reviews that this would be too short on me. I’m a bit self conscious about my legs as I’m on the thicker side with a little jiggle so I don’t want to have short shorts. I’m 5’5 170lbs with a bit of a booty and it fits perfect. It does scrunch up a bit in the crotch from time to time but nothing bad. I went out and bought it in several other colors!
The straps weren't adjustable and there was no support in the top. The bottom was baggier than expected. I ordered a small but could've used a extra small. Unfortunately I'll be returning this

Great free people dupe. There’s a few options out there and I must have confused this with another one that has pockets, because this does not. But not a big deal. The built in underwear didn’t need adjusting. Bra is semi supportive. I didn’t wear another under and was ok training back.. cardio was a lil more jiggly. I’ve lost 30ish pounds recently and still going. Currently I’m 192 and wearing a large. I can probably size down to a medium when I reach 180.  Update 6/29/24 - current weight 183.5 so down almost 10# from when I got this. Still fits good, just wish the straps were tighter or adjustable. Nips show thru both pink and black. But obvi worse w pink. Still obsessed 😍 Slightly short for cardio. Have to adjust often.

This romper is great quality and looks great! The bottom half is a little tight, but not uncomfortable, so maybe size up. Doesn’t have a built in bra, which is unfortunate, but is double layered so I dont think it’s needed. Highly recommend!
If the shorts underneath were just  tad longer
Loved the top half then the waistline was off and shorts were super short.
I love it. A touch small on my, but I have gained a little weight ans should have sized up (their sizing was accurate, mine off).
really wanted to like this for the summer months. This was too short for my torso and the shorts really flare out. Overall uncomfortable and ended up returning. Cute style?

I ordered the purple pink color and i was hoping it’d be more purple like the picture. The outer layer of material is nice but the inner net liner makes this feel cheap and makes this garment super thin. The shorts also come up a little short on me.
Great material. Love how it fits. So comfy

评论概述: Love this free people inspired jumpsuit
评论详情: Thankful to find a lookalike for a fraction of the price! So comfortable and worth every penny.

评论概述: No built in bra of shelf support
评论详情: I returned this because although it was super cute and flattering, it didn’t have any shelf support or built in bra. It did nothing for my chest at all (for reference, bra size is 34B here, so not working with anything that needs mega support). It gave zero boob shape or lift,  but also wasn’t tight enough up top to act as a sports bra. A shelf bra would have helped a lot, and I probably would have kept it with that feature. Didn’t want to bother with a strapless bra with it, and anything else would have shown, so back it went.

Just trying the garment on and looking in the mirror for 10 seconds, it's comfortable and flattering, but the issue is the shorts underneath. The undershorts are not long enough for my taste and ride up. I decided to put another pair of 3" bike shorts underneath for extra support/coverage. I am 5'4", 175 lbs and the Large fit perfectly. I am thick in the butt and hips and the shorts fit with extra space to give that fit and flare look.
This is the cutest dupe! Quality is a good 10/10. I got a size large, I’m 5’8 and typically a size 6 or 8! I got a large for the length and it fits all around greatly!
very comfortable
Perfect romper for work from home or weekend activities with a toddler. Built in underwear like running shorts so great for being active.
Adorable fit.  Breathable, true to size.  Great colors!  Love it.

评论概述: what a cute set to add in for spring

Love this romper so much! The color is exactly what it shows in the picture and it’s so comfy! It’s true to size.
I didn’t see there are no bra pads or a spot to put my own. The fit is a bit snug, I ordered a size small, I’m 5’2” 120lbs and typically wear a size small.
I am 5’8, I wear a size 2 so I got a small, and it is way too short. When I bent over my butt checks were showing. The material is super nice & I am bummed that I had to return it.
This hides all the right things and is really comfortable to wear. I will be ordering other colors!

Great product! Fit is great. Does not have a padding. That’s the only downside, but still a wonderful dupe!

I am a more curvy woman and I was so worried that this wou,d make me look more square than give me shape. I was also worried about the length of the torso. It is really a great one-piece for workouts, errands, or anything where you want to be cute but comfy at the same time. I pair it with a cropped hoodie or a cropped zip up and I feel amazing!

This was an amazing purchase, I loved how the color looked on me and received many compliments. It does not have any padding for the boobs but its extremely comfortable and the whole outfit fits great, the fabric is great too, very easy to perform sports in this onepiece!!
This could be 5 stars if there was padding or at least a slot to put bra inserts in. Black is probably ok, but I’d feel uncomfortable wearing any light color without that. Otherwise very cute/comfy!
Fits great my only issue is there’s no built in bra or at least those little cup inserts 🙄

Best outfit to workout in or just lounge around the house in! I’ll wear a long plaid jacket over it and do some errands! Love it! I wear it all the time! The material is stretchy, smooth and breathable!
I love this outfit so much I’ll be buying it in every color! Definitely worth it!
